ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Pharoah misguided his people. He was no guide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The Pharaoh had led his people astray, and did not rightly guide them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Pharaoh led his people astray; he did not guide them aright.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Pharaoh and his people had gone away from guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And Firaun led his people astray, and did not guide them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Fir`awn led his people astray, and he did not guide them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Firon led astray his people and he did not guide (them) aright.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: so Pharaoh had led his people astray, and was no guide to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Pharaoh led his folk astray, he did not guide them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: For Pharaoh had led his people astray and did not guide them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Fir'awn led his nation astray, and guided them not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Pharaoh led his people astray and did not guide them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Pharaoh led his people astray instead of leading them aright.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Fir'aun (Pharaoh) led his people astray, and he did not guide them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: For Pharaoh had misled his nation, and did not guide them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Pharaoh misled his people, and did not guide them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Pharaoh led his people astray and did not guide [them].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:79] And Pharaoh led his people astray, by calling them to worship him, and he did not guide them, nay he led them to destruction, in contrast to what he said [to them], and I guide you only to the path of rectitude [Q. 40:29].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Pharaoh led his folk astray) Pharaoh destroyed his people in the sea, (he did not guide them) he did not save them; it is also said that this means: he misguided them regarding Allah's religion and did not guide them to the Truth.
